name: TikTok
author: popularr
description: A cog that notifies specified Discord channels when tracked TikTok accounts post new videos.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the TikTok cog! Use `[p]help tiktok` for available commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores usernames and channel IDs in the bot's configuration to manage notifications. No other personal data is collected.
